channel.title: Goals on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Goals on Home

item.title: Create Smarter Goals
item.description: If you are anything like me, passion and self-motivation compels you to generate ambitious goals. Perhaps even, out of excitement, writing them down and sharing them with loved ones. Then, I sit back and contentedly coddle myself in satisfaction for merely having created a goal at all hoping it will provide direction and purpose. Then, I hold onto the illusion that I responsibly took my time and evaluated my needs.
